00096 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00097 {
00098         char *full_db_path = NULL;
00099         char *full_log_path = NULL;
00100         int path_length = 0;
00101         int retstat = 0;
00102         struct tagfs_state tagfs_data;
00103         tagfs_data.dbpath = NULL;
00104         tagfs_data.execdir = NULL;
00105         tagfs_data.logfile = NULL;
00106 
00107         debug_init(); /* initialize debug semaphore */
00108 
00109         printf("Initializing TagFS...\n");
00110 
00111         /* executable directory */
00112         tagfs_data.execdir = get_file_directory(realpath(argv[0], NULL)); /* get full path to executable directory and remove everything after last / */
00113         assert(tagfs_data.execdir != NULL);
00114 
00115         /* log path */
00116         path_length = strlen(tagfs_data.execdir) + strlen("log.txt"); 
00117         assert(path_length > 0);
00118         full_log_path = malloc(path_length * sizeof(*full_log_path) + 1);
00119         assert(full_log_path != NULL);
00120         (void)snprintf(full_log_path, path_length + 1, "%slog.txt", tagfs_data.execdir);
00121         tagfs_data.logfile = open_log(full_log_path); /* full path to log file */
00122         assert(tagfs_data.logfile != NULL);
00123         free(full_log_path);
00124 
00125         /* db path */
00126         path_length = strlen(tagfs_data.execdir) + strlen("tagfs.sl3"); 
00127         assert(path_length > 0);
00128         tagfs_data.dbpath = malloc(path_length * sizeof(*full_db_path) + 1);
00129         assert(tagfs_data.dbpath != NULL);
00130         (void)snprintf(tagfs_data.dbpath, path_length + 1, "%stagfs.sl3", tagfs_data.execdir);
00131 
00132         retstat = fuse_main(argc, argv, &tagfs_oper, &tagfs_data);
00133 
00134         close_log(tagfs_data.logfile);
00135         free(tagfs_data.execdir);
00136         free(tagfs_data.dbpath);
00137         return retstat;
00138 } /* main */
